It's been 8 months since I have been using (neo)vim as my primary text editor. Initially it was incredibly tough to adopt and use it in work. Well that would be another story to tell.

Back then I was working mostly in backend using CoffeeScript (I know ðŸ™ˆ). VS Code offered a little support to this already dead language so I didn't had any problems using vim full time.

But things changed drastically when I moved into UI development this year. I had to spend hours reading blogs, threads on reddit to create at least a workable setup for a hassle-less React enviornment. Here I am sharing some those experiences.
